attributes.action: apply pressure to all agencies possible to ensure the safe release of Gilad Shalit as soon as possible.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recently, French president Nicolas Sarkozy pledged to work for his release, and German mediators have been working at brokering a deal for quite some time. Now is the time for the UK Government to take the same sort of action.
